h4.b: Click ">" in the first column of any row below to see your team's entire submission history for that question.

search.query: | inputlookup ctf_users | search [ search | eval user="$env:user$" `get_user_info` | fields Team] | eval RealPlusSplunk=DisplayUsername . " (" . Username . ")" | stats values(RealPlusSplunk) as TeamMates | eval TeamMates=mvjoin(TeamMates, ", ")

index=scoreboard AND (Result="Incorrect" OR Result="Correct" OR Result=Hint OR Result=Bonus) `get_user_info` | search [ | makeresults | eval user="$env:user$" `get_user_info` | fields Team] | stats count as Attempts, max(BasePointsAwarded) as BasePointsEarned, max(SpeedBonusAwarded) as BonusPointsEarned, sum(Penalty) as PenaltyPoints, max(AdditionalBonusAwarded) as AdditionalBonus, count(eval(Result=="Incorrect")) as IncorrectAttempts, count(eval(Result=="Correct")) as CorrectAttempts by Number | append [ inputlookup ctf_questions | eval Attempts = 0 | eval IncorrectAttempts = 0 | eval CorrectAttempts = 0 | fields Number Question BasePoints Attempts CorrectAttempts IncorrectAttempts] | stats last(Question) as Question, last(BasePoints) as BasePointsAvailable, last(BasePointsEarned) as BasePointsEarned, last(BonusPointsEarned) as BonusPointsEarned, max(AdditionalBonus) as AdditionalBonus, sum(PenaltyPoints) as PenaltyPoints, sum(Attempts) as Attempts, sum(IncorrectAttempts) as IncorrectAttempts, sum(CorrectAttempts) as CorrectAttempts by Number | eval Status = if(Attempts = 0,"Unanswered", Status) | eval Status = if(IncorrectAttempts > 0, "Incorrect", Status) | eval Status = if(CorrectAttempts > 0, "Correct", Status) | fillnull value=0 BasePointsEarned | fillnull value=0 BonusPointsEarned | fillnull value=0 PenaltyPoints | fillnull value=0 AdditionalBonus | fields Number Question Status BasePointsAvailable BasePointsEarned BonusPointsEarned AdditionalBonus PenaltyPoints | rename BasePointsAvailable as "Base Points Avail." | rename BasePointsEarned as "Base Points Earned" | rename BonusPointsEarned as "Speed Bonus Earned" | rename PenaltyPoints as "Penalty" | rename AdditionalBonus as "Additional Bonus"
| sort Number
